title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.5 - Fees and charges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.5 - Fees and charges

State Regulations

The charge to the applicant for the guarantee of a loan of a
lending institution by the fund shall be one and one-half percent of the loan
as of the date of the closing of the loan. Such charge shall be payable to the
fund by the applicant upon request on or after the date of the
closing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1002.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
